title: Christine Lagarde - Wikipedia
snippet: On 2 July 2019, Christine Lagarde was nominated by the European Council to succeed Mario Draghi as President of the European Central Bank (ECB) on 1 November 2019.

title: President of the European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: The president of the European Central ... (EU). The current president of the European Central Bank is Christine Lagarde, previously the chair and managing director of the International Monetary Fund....

title: Christine Lagarde
snippet: President of the European Central Bank Chair of the European Systemic Risk Board Member of the Board of Directors at the Bank for International Settlements Member of the G7 Member of the G20

title: Christine Lagarde - President of the European Central Bank | LinkedIn
snippet: She resigned from the IMF on 12 September 2019 following her nomination as President of the European Central Bank. Christine Lagarde took up her role as ECB President on 1 November 2019.

title: Christine Lagarde appointed President of the European Central Bank - Consilium
snippet: The European Council appointed Christine Lagarde to be the President of the European Central Bank for a non-renewable term of 8 years.
